trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of seconds after which aborts a transaction when it is waiting for a lock. When aborts (and rolls back) the transaction, the transaction receives an SQLException of SQLState 40XL1.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of seconds after which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> aborts a transaction when it is waiting for a lock.
When aborts (and rolls back) the transaction, the transaction receives an SQLException of SQLState 40XL1.

target.mrk: Specifies the number of seconds after which <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> aborts a transaction when it is waiting for a lock.
When aborts (and rolls back) the transaction, the transaction receives an SQLException of SQLState 40XL1.

trans-unit.source: The time specified by this property is approximate.

seg-source.mrk: The time specified by this property is approximate.

target.mrk: The time specified by this property is approximate.

trans-unit.source: A zero value for this property means that <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> aborts a transaction any time it cannot immediately obtain a lock that it requests.

seg-source.mrk: A zero value for this property means that <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> aborts a transaction any time it cannot immediately obtain a lock that it requests.

target.mrk: A zero value for this property means that <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> aborts a transaction any time it cannot immediately obtain a lock that it requests.

trans-unit.source: A negative value for this property is equivalent to an infinite wait time; the transaction waits forever to obtain the lock.

seg-source.mrk: A negative value for this property is equivalent to an infinite wait time; the transaction waits forever to obtain the lock.

target.mrk: A negative value for this property is equivalent to an infinite wait time; the transaction waits forever to obtain the lock.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value greater than or equal to zero but less than the value of derby.locks.deadlockTimeout, never performs any deadlock checking.

seg-source.mrk: If this property is set to a value greater than or equal to zero but less than the value of derby.locks.deadlockTimeout, never performs any deadlock checking.

target.mrk: If this property is set to a value greater than or equal to zero but less than the value of derby.locks.deadlockTimeout, never performs any deadlock checking.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic; the change takes effect immediately. For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic; the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

target.mrk: Dynamic; the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.
